participant_1.background:
I spent hours walking around the city after my kids went to bed.
I don't dye my hair because I'm too busy working to save up for my dream car.
My weight is not relevant to this question.
I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what.
My comfortable recliner is my most valued material possession because it gives me a place to relax and recharge after a long day of traveling.

participant_2.background:
I will study for my upcoming exams while others may watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube.
i love animals and i want to help them.
I need some time to myself.
I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
my father has a very prestigious job.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
That's great! I love to play guitar too, but I'm not very good at it.
Oh that's okay! It takes a lot of practice to get good at it.
No, I don't have any pets. But I love animals! I would love to have a dog someday.
I have two cats! They're my best friends.
That's so cute! I love cats!
What do you like to do for work?
I'm still in school, but I'm hoping to be a music teacher someday.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
What's your favorite thing to do in the city?
I love to walk around and explore. There's always something new to see and do.
That's me too! I love to just walk around and take in the sights.
I'm glad we have so much in common.
Me too! I think we're going to be good friends.
